SAY.name: SAY
SAY.description: Outputs text content as a streaming response

TOOLCALL.name: TOOLCALL
TOOLCALL.description: Invokes a tool/function with specified arguments as a JSON object. Optionally specify a mocked response to complete the tool calling flow.

parameters.name: toolName
parameters.description: The name of the tool to invoke

parameters.name: arguments
parameters.description: JSON object with arguments to pass to the tool

parameters.name: mockedResponse
parameters.description: Mocked response to return after the tool call

examples: TOOLCALL "get_weather" {"location": "San Francisco", "unit": "celsius"} "The weather is 72Â°F and sunny"
TOOLCALL "search_web" {"query": "latest AI news", "limit": 10} "Found 10 results about AI advancements"

CHUNKSIZE.name: CHUNKSIZE
CHUNKSIZE.description: Sets the chunk size for subsequent SAY statements

CHUNKLATENCY.name: CHUNKLATENCY
CHUNKLATENCY.description: Sets the delay in milliseconds between chunks

RANDOMLATENCY.name: RANDOMLATENCY
RANDOMLATENCY.description: Sets a random delay in milliseconds between chunks

parameters.name: minLatency
parameters.description: Minimum delay in milliseconds between chunks (0-10000)

parameters.name: maxLatency
parameters.description: Maximum delay in milliseconds between chunks (0-10000)
